# Calgary Office Advisors

> Commercial real estate insights, building directory, and trusted references for Calgary businesses navigating the leasing process.

## Main Sections

- /: Homepage - discover Calgary's office spaces
- /buildings: Office building directory by submarket
- /buildings/calculator: Office space calculator tool
- /coworking: Coworking spaces directory
- /insights: Companies directory and articles
- /references: Designers, law firms, and lease professionals
- /contact: Contact information
- /about: About Calgary Office Advisors
- /services: Services offered

## Insights & Articles

- /insights/office-costs-calgary: Guide to Office Costs in Calgary
- /insights/plan-office-move: How to Plan Your Office Move
- /insights/sublease-vs-headlease: Sublease vs Headlease - What You Need to Know

## Building Submarkets

- /buildings/submarket/downtown: Downtown Calgary office buildings
- /buildings/submarket/beltline: Beltline district offices
- /buildings/submarket/suburban-south: Suburban South office locations
- /buildings/submarket/suburban-north: Suburban North office locations

## Coworking Areas

- /coworking/bia/kensington: Kensington Business Improvement Area
- /coworking/bia/victoria-park: Victoria Park Business Improvement Area

## Key Features

- Office Space Calculator: Calculate square footage needs based on offices, cubicles, meeting rooms
- Deals of the Quarter: Quarterly lease transaction intelligence
- Calgary Business Directory: Map and listings of Calgary companies
- Building Directory: Informational profiles of Calgary office buildings

## Contact

Calgary Office Advisors provides commercial real estate advisory services for Calgary tenants.
